nodes.text: Hacina was a female Dathomiri witch who lived on the planet Dathomir. She belonged to the Red Mud Potters Clan though she was also secretly a member of the Nightsisters.

In 43.5 ABY, during the annual meeting of the Raining Leaves Clan and the Broken Columns Clan, Hacina was part of a group of Nightsisters that tried to sabotage the two clan's union. The Nightsisters sent a large swarm of sparkflies against the Raining Leaves and Broken Columns, but Carrack, one of the guides hired by Han Solo and Jedi Knight Leia Organa Solo, fired a grenade launcher in Hacina's position. Hacina and another unidentified Nightsister perished from the grenade blast.
